main.name: Daniel Soledad
main.description: I eat, sleep and breathe code
main.bio: I'm a Daniel Soledad, a Full Stack Engineer who is a fast learner, Graduated from intense A 24-week intensive program focused on gaining technical programming skills in HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, jQuery, Bootstrap, Node, MySQL, MongoDB, Express, Handelbars.js & React.Js. Later transitioned into a tutor and TA role to enforce those skills by tutoring students understand web development concepts. I have used my analytical skills to create user-friendly applications with various technologies like React, Next, Bootstrap, Bulma, Tailwind CSS, Style Components, SASS and traditionally CSS. Worked with various groups to create cool projects, and contribute to them by using my critical thinking skills to help plan projects , communicate ideas, evaluating problems and solving problems. Please use my contact below and built something together. LETS CODE!!!
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me lets built something together!!

work.title: Teaching Assistant at Denver University
work.description: Assist instructor by ensuring a class of 20 to 40 students understood programming concepts effectively. Able to work with multiple people or one on one with a positive attitude. Helped instructor keep the class on track by maintaining a tight schedule. Manage course material on GitLab. Help students gaining technical programming skills in HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, jQuery, Bootstrap, Node Js, MySQL, MongoDB, Express, Handelbars.js & ReactJS. Used google sheet, google calendar, and calendly to keep student roster and tutoring sessions organized.

work.title: Bartender
work.description: Used effective communication skills, time management and personality to achieve to customers satisfaction. While communicating with 150 or more customers per week, maintained a 90% customer satisfaction rating by providing quality customer service in a high pace environment, and enabling happiness by company standards

projects.title: Dono Application Charity
projects.category: React, Express, Node, MongoDB, MaterialUi, Cloudinary, Socket.io, Heroku

projects.title: Facebook Clone
projects.category: Tailwind CSS, and NEXT AUTH, Firebase

testimonials.text: Daniel is honestly and without any exaggeration the most talented programmer Iâ€™ve ever worked with. I had the great pleasure of working with him on our UW Capstone Project. He was the central pillar and driving force to our projects successes. He is a savant when it comes to learning and understanding complex Computer Science concepts. Out of the many features that we implemented he was responsible for more than half. He is genuinely a Full Stack Developer as he is proficient in both Front End and Back End development. Any company that hires Daniel will be getting the best programmer possible!
testimonials.user: Abdulhakeem Dahir - Full Stack Web Developer | MERN | UI/UX

testimonials.text: Daniel Soledad is a coding machine. We worked together on two out of the three projects at the University of Washington's Coding Bootcamp, including the final capstone project. Without his relentless approach and untiring work-ethic neither of our two projects would have evolved into the exemplary class-projects that we were able to share with pride when it came time for presentations. Because he has such a thorough understanding of how all of the code fits together, he is able to move effortlessly back and forth between the front-end and the back-end, catching errors, coaching people up, and lending a helping hand wherever needed. Daniel's memory is impeccable and his ability to quickly absorb the intricacies of cutting edge technologies, even with limited available documentation, is honestly inspiring. I have zero doubt that he will prove to be a huge asset to whoever hires him. Daniel the real deal.

Daniel is a one in a million coder. I often competitively grinded away my nights as a student of the University of Washington's Coding Bootcamp just so I could feel l was catching up with Daniel's talents and deep understanding of the code in front him, but I'm not sure I ever did. He is an inspiration and an amazing team lead. I got the pleasure of working with him on the capstone project for the boot camp and he was a wonderful asset to the team. He always made sure that he was able to help us and other students in the camp even with his full schedule. He's adept knowledge and ability to grasp concepts quick make him a standout developer any team would be happy to have.
testimonials.user: Taanileka Maama - Full Stack Developer | Web Developer @ Sporcle | TA & Tutor @ Trilogy Ed.
